description: Retrieves the Puppet control repo and job script for the specified job instance id.

cd4pe_web_ui_endpoint.description: web ui endpoint of CD4PE. Used to download control repo and job scripts to execute jobs.

cd4pe_token.description: Token used to hit Tokened CD4PE endpoints.

cd4pe_job_owner.description: Account (workspace) owner of the job to be run.

env_vars.description: Environment variables to be set on the agent running the job.

docker_image.description: If specified, the job will attempt to run inside a container.

docker_run_args.description: The arguments to pass to the container runtime.

docker_pull_creds.description: Base64-encoded config.json to use when pulling the specified container image.

base_64_ca_cert.description: Ca cert needed to communicate with CD4PE if ssl is enabled.

secrets.description: Hash containing environment variables that should be set before running job script.
